EmailTemplate.description: Template for email to be sent to Finance when Quote is revised
EmailTemplate.name: Template for Finance when Revised Quote request is created
EmailTemplate.subject: Generate/Send Termination Form Lease - {!Quote_Summary__c.Old_Lease_Number__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Finance Team,
{!Quote_Summary__c.Dealer_Account__c} has requested a revision for Lease {!Quote_Summary__c.Old_Lease_Number__c}. Please review the change to ensure it is acceptable and if so, generate and send a termination form.
If change is not acceptable, please terminate the lease document routing and email the dealer to notify them of the invalid change request.
Regards Lease Team
